data.text:
Marie-Madeleine

Godess & spiritual guides

Botanical name: Tsuga canadensis, Picea glauca, Nardostachys jatamansi, Angelica archangelica, Boswellia sacra, Citrus aurantium ssp. aurantium, Hyssopus officinalis.

Free shipping for online orders of more than 69$, before taxes, within Canada.

(View the maximum available formats for free delivery)

Save as PDF

Words by Mikaël

MARIE-MADELEINE

Opening of the Heart

Even if the Gospels never specifically mention that Marie-Madeleine is a prostitute or a sinner, it is in this way that misogynists designated her. Marie-Madeleine does not, however, care about these false judgments. She forgives unconditionally, from where emanates a beautiful and sweet energy. His significant role with Jesus, as described in the Gospels, shows him washing his feet, as the witness of his death, as well as one of the first people to whom he appears after his resurrection. Among the other roles which are the subject of controversy and which she could have held with Jesus, there is in particular that of the wife of Christ, that of a priestess of the Temple or else of a disciple.Invoke it to help you forgive and open your heart more to love.

Aromatic synergy created by Mikaël Zayat

This aromatic blend helps strengthen the chemistry between matter and spirit. These oils accompany you to pass through difficult moments with courage and serenity.

Breathe deeply the synergy in the bottle then put a drop on the sternum. It will spread throughout your body and your soul.

"Love yourself, love others and every situation, no matter how you look. "

Cautions

Keep away from children, air, heat and light.

More information

Exclusive creation of Mikaël Zayat

Composition: hemlock, white spruce, Himalayan nard, olibanum, angelica, neroli, hyssop.
